jobs.prompt: Minimalist logo for 'Future Sketches' company. Design a modern 'FS' monogram where the F is made of precise, clean digital lines (geometric, tech-inspired) and the S flows into hand-drawn sketch strokes. Color palette: indigo (#4F46E5) and orange (#F97316). Professional but creative. White background. Vector style with mixed precise/organic feel.

Logo wordmark for 'FUTURE SKETCHES' where 'FUTURE' is written in clean, modern sans-serif typography (geometric, tech-inspired) and 'SKETCHES' appears in hand-drawn, sketchbook style with organic brush strokes. Colors: indigo (#4F46E5) for FUTURE, orange (#F97316) for SKETCHES. Professional creative agency vibe. White background.

Abstract icon combining technology and creativity: left half shows a precise pixel grid or circuit pattern (indigo #4F46E5), right half transitions into flowing hand-drawn brush strokes and sketch marks (orange #F97316). Minimalist, balanced composition. White background. Suitable as app icon or brand mark.

Logo for 'Future Sketches': stylized pencil icon where the pencil body is made of geometric, digital elements (circuits, pixels, clean lines in indigo #4F46E5) but the pencil tip creates organic, hand-drawn sketch marks and doodles (orange #F97316). Tech meets human creativity. White background. Modern and professional.

Minimalist 'F' letter mark logo that morphs from structured digital letterform (top, precise geometric shapes in indigo #4F46E5) into loose, flowing sketch strokes (bottom, hand-drawn organic lines in orange #F97316). Represents Future Sketches brand - technology meeting human creativity. Clean, professional. White background.

Logo combining 'Future Sketches' text with icon: clean sans-serif 'FUTURE' in indigo (#4F46E5) next to a small square icon showing half precise grid/circuit pattern, half hand-drawn sketch lines. Below, 'sketches' in lowercase, sketchy hand-drawn style in orange (#F97316). Balanced, professional creative tech company. White background.
